forum.content:
As much as I hate being single, and not like I've been in any relationship at all, I'm so tired of sticking my head into making conversation with strangers from/on apps and wish for anything to happen, when nothing does.

It's been hard since I'm not good at creating small talks in Chinese, and which is probably why/how people eventually find me boring and stop talking to me.

I'm pretty sure I have better personal traits and character than average guys, as I've been told by a lot friends.

But oh wellz, I guess that's just how life is...🤦🏻‍♂️
forum.title: Mentally Exhausted (不翻譯)
